name: José Luis Rodríguez
description: '''José Luis Rodríguez González''' ({{IPA|es-419|xoseˈlwis roˈðɾiɣes}}; 14 January 1943), nicknamed ''El Puma'' ("The [[Cougar]]"), is a Venezuelan singer and actor who is known for having recorded many international super hits and participated in a handful of [[telenovela]]s. He has also served as a coach and mentor on the [[La voz (Argentina)|Argentine]], the [[La Voz Peru|Peruvian]], and the [[The Voice Chile|Chilean]] versions of ''[[The Voice (franchise)|The Voice]]'', as well as a judge on ''[[Factor X (Chilean TV series)|The X Factor Chile]]''.
